Movies
Audio
Books
XXX

This option was removed from NZB Finder as it really is pretty buggy and most of all, unsafe.

We'd like to suggest using NZB Unity, which is a browser extension. It creates an extra download button on every release, enabling you to send the NZB directly to SABNZBd or NZBGet.


Download NZB Unity

Download for Chrome or download for Firefox

If there's another extension that works well with other browsers, please let us know. Developers of these extensions can always contact us at: hello@nzbfinder.ws

Another option if to add NZB's to your Cart, and then have your downloader fetch the Cart RSS URL every 5 minutes. Please don't use a value lower than 5 minutes as it will cause unnecessary load on our servers. Users caught doing so will get a warning and may eventually be banned from the site.

Save
